WorkItem.ClosedComment: Every model now has movement speed marked as relevant, though it may have no impact on calcs in that model
WorkItem.Description: I use Tuskarr's Vitality for both my Resto Shaman and my Elemental Shaman. Rawr says that it is not available every time. Is there a way to manually add this to the enchant list for my characters?

Comments.Message: Actually, there are many classes that use this enchant in raids.  my moonkin used to and my lock does, too.  Any chance it could be added to all the models?
Someone go through and list all the models missing these

Rawr.Retribution doesn't list it, and this is intended.

Stamina is only a 'display' stat but not actually part of the gear valuation.
Runspeed isn't on the list of relevant stats (again pretty much intended, ret has PoJ as part of the spec).  
I could add runspeed to the relevant stats just to make this enchant show if needed, but it wouldn't have any value, ranking the enchant as last.
That's fine, make it listed, ALL models need movement speed stuff listed

Ret pretty much takes PoJ by default.  So a runspeed enchant has zero effect. :)

Regardless, now added to secondary stats to make tuskarr's appear.  No modelling for it however, so the enchant has zero value on dps.

Kitty druids are the same way. Tuskanar is useless given that our run speed talent overwrites the enchant's speed boost. However the talent becomes more useful if the speed talent is not select (I don't know why a kitty druid would NOT take that talent but you never know). Only thing I would say is default to the speed buff if the talent is not selected (you never know people will sometimes not take that talent).
